style_notes: Austurbane aesthetic - minimalist Mediterranean biblical style with dramatic natural lighting, plant shadows, earth tones, and sacred simplicity. Top-down or elevated 45-degree compositions. Professional editorial photography.
color_palette: Sand beige, warm cream, weathered terracotta, raw umber, burnt sienna, dusty clay, copper, bronze, aged gold, muted olive green, dusty sage, warm stone gray, natural limestone white

images.title: Why I'm Writing This
images.prompt: Minimalist biblical product photography, ancient papyrus scrolls partially unrolled on weathered limestone surface beside terracotta inkwell and bronze stylus, Mediterranean austere aesthetic, dramatic morning sunlight creating sharp olive branch shadows diagonally across composition, top-down isometric view, small clay oil lamp as supporting element, prismatic light through ancient glass vessel in background, color palette of warm sand beige, weathered terracotta, oxidized bronze and raw umber, massive negative space on right third of frame, professional editorial photography, sacred minimalist composition, natural film grain
